# Largest 20 diamonds

```{r results='asis'}
diamonds %>% 
  arrange(desc(depth)) %>% 
  slice(1:20) %>% 
  select(depth, carat, cut, color, clarity) %>% 
  knitr::kable(
    caption = "The largest 20 diamonds in the dataset"
  )
